it.polimi.se2018

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes Player behavior. Token number can be decreased when they are used. Beside this and the constructor the class only contains getters and setters.
    Author:
    Daniele Montesi

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(java.lang.String username)
      Constructor: generates a player with a username, a WindowPatternCard (to be set) and a corresponding amount of tokens
